item.title: Wednesday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 climbed to a fresh record close on Tuesday, propelled by gains in the tech sector.

item.title: Tesla's charts look attractive as the new year approaches. Here's why
item.description: Jay Woods of Freedom Capital Markets breaks down the charts on Tesla ahead of 2026.

item.title: Nvidia and this athleisure maker saw big insider selling last week
item.description: A CNBC Pro data analysis shows insiders sold many shares of Nvidia, Lululemon Athletica, Las Vegas Sands, Gap and other stocks last week

item.title: Buy these three stocks as part of your ‘set-it & forget it’ 2026 portfolio, says Evercore ISI
item.description: Evercore ISI's standout technology stocks for the new year include Amphenol, Apple and Arista Networks.

item.title: U.S. GDP grew much faster than expected in the third quarter. What that means for rate cuts in 2026
item.description: The third quarter’s U.S. GDP reading came in stronger than anticipated, raising questions of what the findings might mean for rates in 2026.
